content: another design from wandering cat studio baby janes i am a great lover of shoes and feel that no girl make a perfect last minute shower gift can have to many that s just as true for grown because they are simple and don t take much women as it is for babies yarn it s easy to pair them with a knit cardigan or start the little ones off right with a pair or two even matching bonnet of three of baby janes they are soft warm and happy knitting stylish not to mention easy to knit a pair takes valerie very little yarn and they knit up quickly so they materials sizes 0-3 months 3 inches small amount of dk yarn 3-6 months 3 5 inches set of 3 5 mm dpns 6-9 months 4 inches two small buttons 9-12 months 4 5 inches copyright statement pattern designed by valerie johnson wandering cat studio 2009 user may not copy and/or distribute pattern for profit or otherwise baby janes page 2 abbreviations and stitches notes there are three sizes for the pattern k = knit k2tog = knit two additional sizes are marked in paren- m1 = make one stitch stitches together thesis ssk = slip slip knit to yo = yarn over stitches together pattern cast on 24 28 32 36 join in the round being right shoe careful not to twist knit across first 8 stitches putting all the stitches on round 1 knit one needle round 2 k1 m1 k10 12 14 16 m1 k2 m1 k10 12 cast on 10 stitches 14 16 m1 k1 immediately following 28 32 36 40 stitches row 1 knit round 3 knit row 2 knit to last 2 sts yo k2tog round 4 k2 m1 k10 12 14 16 m1 k4 m1 k10 12 row 3 k 14 16 m1 k2 cast off 32 36 40 44 stitches round 5 knit left shoe round 6 k3 m1 k10 12 14 16 m1 k6 m1 k10 12 knit across first 8 stitches putting all the stitches on 14 16 m1 k3 one needle 36 40 44 48 stitches row 1 knit cast on 10 stitches round 7 knit row 2 k round 8 k4 m1 k10 12 14 16 m1 k8 m1 k10 row 3 knit to last 2 sts yo k2tog 12 14 16 m1 k4 row 4 k 40 44 48 52 stitches cast off knit four rounds even finishing begin decreases sew up bottom seam sew in loose ends sew on round 1 k2tog k10 12 14 16 ssk x 4 k2tog x 4 button find an adorable child to dress up and k10 12 14 16 ssk enjoy 30 34 38 42 stitches round 2 k round 3 k10 12 14 16 ssk x2 k2 k2tog x 2 k10 12 14 16 26 30 34 38 stitches round 4 k8 cast of to last 8 sts k8 thank you for purchasing this pattern if you have
